alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Broadwater and northwestern Meagher Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles northwest of White Sulphur Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Logan On The Smith River, Newlan Creek Reservoir and Fort Logan. This includes Highway 89 between mile markers 7 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central and southwestern Montana.
